curriculums.subject: Mathematics
curriculums.goals: Develop strong foundational math skills including arithmetic operations, fractions, decimals, and basic geometry. Students will learn problem-solving strategies and mathematical reasoning.

curriculums.subject: Science
curriculums.goals: Explore the natural world through hands-on experiments and observations. Topics include ecosystems, weather patterns, simple machines, and the solar system.

curriculums.subject: English Language Arts
curriculums.goals: Develop English language proficiency through reading comprehension, vocabulary building, and writing exercises. Focus on grammar fundamentals and conversational skills.

curriculums.subject: Mathematics
curriculums.goals: Extend mathematical understanding with pre-algebra concepts, complex fractions, decimals, percentages, and geometric principles. Emphasis on problem-solving and critical thinking.

curriculums.subject: History
curriculums.goals: Explore ancient civilizations with focus on Greek history, mythology, and cultural contributions. Students will develop research skills and historical analysis.
